name: SK WP Settings Backup
author: Skpstorm

sections.description:
This plugin extends the tool panel adding the possibility to import and export plugin options and settings.

This plugin will export/import only the options, it won’t create tables nor activation hooks, ask the author of the plugin you want to use it for if you’re not sure.

Developers

If you want to add this plugin support to your plugin check SK Multi User Ads code or send me an email
